short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically enable data-savings mode at compatible websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tell websites that you prefer to save data and costs. At websitesâ€™ discretion, you may see lower quality images and fewer media elements as webpages adjust to reduce data downloads.

The extension works by sending the "Save-Data: on" HTTP header with every request. This extension is not a data compression proxy like the Data Saver/Lite option in Google Chrome, or Opera Turbo and Yandex.browser Turbo mode.
